titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C26

availability.licence: Distributed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License

body.ab:
<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0102__main__24"/>One evening
I sat
in my
<del loc="c57-0102__main__d1e16626__Start"/>chemic<del loc="c57-0102__main__d1e16626__End"/><lb n="c57-0102__main__25"/>workshop,
the sun had
set
& the moon <lb n="c57-0102__main__26"/>was just rising from the
sea â€”
I had not
<lb n="c57-0102__main__27"/>light
sufficient
for my
<del loc="c57-0102__main__d1e16637__Start"/>work<del loc="c57-0102__main__d1e16637__End"/>employment
and I
sat <lb n="c57-0102__main__28"/>idle <del loc="c57-0102__main__d1e16647__Start"/>mus<del loc="c57-0102__main__d1e16647__End"/><del loc="c57-0102__main__d1e16650__Start"/>untill<del loc="c57-0102__main__d1e16650__End"/>
in
<del loc="c57-0102__main__d1e16655__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0102__main__d1e16655__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>a
pause of consideration <lb n="c57-0102__main__29"/>of whether I should leave my labour for <lb n="c57-0102__main__30"/>the
night
or hasten its conclusion by an <lb n="c57-0102__main__31"/>unremitting attention to it. As I
sat
a train <lb n="c57-0102__main__32"/>of reflection occurred to
me
which led
to
me
<lb n="c57-0102__main__33"/>consider the effects of what I was now <lb n="c57-0102__main__34"/>doing.
<del loc="c57-0102__main__d1e16687__Start"/>Two<del loc="c57-0102__main__d1e16687__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>three
years before I
had been
engaged <lb n="c57-0102__main__35"/>in the same
manner
& had created a <lb n="c57-0102__main__36"/>fiend whose
unparralelled
barbarity
had<lb n="c57-0103__main__1"/>desolated
my
heart
and filled it
for<lb n="c57-0103__main__2"/>ever
with the bitterest remorse. I was <lb n="c57-0103__main__3"/>now about to form another
being
of whose <lb n="c57-0103__main__4"/>dispositions I was alike
ignorant.
She <lb n="c57-0103__main__5"/>might
be
ten thousand times more ma<lb n="c57-0103__main__6"/>lignant than her
mate
and
delight
in <lb n="c57-0103__main__7"/>murder & wretchedness. He had sworn <lb n="c57-0103__main__8"/>to quit the neighbourhood of
man
& hide <lb n="c57-0103__main__9"/>himself in
desarts
but she had
not &<lb n="c57-0103__main__10"/>she
who
was
in all probability
to become <lb n="c57-0103__main__11"/>a thinking & reasoning
animal
might <lb n="c57-0103__main__12"/>refuse
to
<del loc="c57-0103__main__d1e16747__Start"/>to<del loc="c57-0103__main__d1e16747__End"/> comply with a compact made <lb n="c57-0103__main__13"/>before her creation. They might even <lb n="c57-0103__main__14"/>hate
one another.
The creature who al<lb n="c57-0103__main__15"/>ready lived loathed his own
deformity
<lb n="c57-0103__main__16"/>& might he not conceive a greater ab<lb n="c57-0103__main__17"/>horrence for it when it came before <lb n="c57-0103__main__18"/>his eyes in the female
form.
She also <lb n="c57-0103__main__19"/>might turn with disgust from him <lb n="c57-0103__main__20"/>to the superior beauty of
man & who <lb n="c57-0103__main__21"/>confine her eyes or wishes.
She might <lb n="c57-0103__main__22"/>quit
him
and he be again
alone <del loc="c57-0103__main__d1e16785__Start"/>with<del loc="c57-0103__main__d1e16785__End"/><metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0103.02">^</metamark><lb n="c57-0103__left_margin__1"/>exasperated
by <lb n="c57-0103__main__23"/>the fresh provocation of being deserted <lb n="c57-0103__main__24"/>by one of his own species.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0103__main__25"/>Even if they were to leave
Europe
<lb n="c57-0103__main__26"/>& inhabit the
desarts
of the new world,
<lb n="c57-0103__main__27"/><del loc="c57-0103__main__d1e16809__Start"/>I<del loc="c57-0103__main__d1e16809__End"/> it was their intention to have children
<lb n="c57-0103__main__28"/>and a race of devils would be propagated <lb n="c57-0103__main__29"/>upon
the
earth from whose form & mind
<lb n="c57-0103__main__30"/>man
shrunk with horror.
<del loc="c57-0103__main__d1e16825__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0103__main__d1e16825__End"/>
had I
any right <lb n="c57-0103__main__31"/><del loc="c57-0103__main__d1e16832__Start"/>for<del loc="c57-0103__main__d1e16832__End"/>
for my own
benefit
to inflict this <lb n="c57-0103__main__32"/>curse
to
everlasting generations? I had <lb n="c57-0103__main__33"/>before been moved by the sophisms <lb n="c57-0103__main__34"/>of the being
whom
I had created; I had <lb n="c57-0103__main__35"/>been
moved
by his fiendish
threats & now
<lb n="c57-0103__main__36"/>for the first
time
the wickedness
<del loc="c57-0103__main__d1e16846__Start"/>& utter<del loc="c57-0103__main__d1e16846__End"/><lb n="c57-0104__main__1"/><del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e16856__Start"/>selfishness<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e16856__End"/><lb n="c57-0104__left_margin__1"/><del loc="c57-0104__left_margin__d1e16863__Start"/>selfishness<del loc="c57-0104__left_margin__d1e16863__End"/>
of my promise burst upon me; <lb n="c57-0104__main__2"/>I shud<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e16876__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e16876__End"/>ered to think that future ages might <lb n="c57-0104__main__3"/>curse me as their
pest
whose
<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e16884__Start"/>selfishness<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e16884__End"/><lb n="c57-0104__main__4"/>had
not hesitated to buy its own peace at <lb n="c57-0104__main__5"/>the
price perhaps
of the
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>existence
of
whole human
<lb n="c57-0104__main__6"/>race. I
trembled, and my heart failed
<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e16903__Start"/>wh<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e16903__End"/><lb n="c57-0104__main__7"/>within me, when
on looking
up
I
saw
<lb n="c57-0104__main__8"/>by the light of the moon, the dÃ¦mon
<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e16913__Start"/>with<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e16913__End"/>at
the
<lb n="c57-0104__left_margin__1"/><del loc="c57-0104__left_margin__d1e16925__Start"/><del loc="c57-0104__left_margin__d1e16926__Start"/>window<del loc="c57-0104__left_margin__d1e16926__End"/><del loc="c57-0104__left_margin__d1e16925__End"/>casement.<lb n="c57-0104__main__9"/>A
ghastly grin
<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e16937__Start"/>on
his
countena<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e16937__End"/> wrinkled <lb n="c57-0104__main__10"/>lips,
as he gazed on
me
where I
sat.
Yes, he had <lb n="c57-0104__main__11"/>followed me in my travels; he had loitered <lb n="c57-0104__main__12"/>in forests, hid himself in
caves
or taken <lb n="c57-0104__main__13"/>refuge in wide &
desart heaths
& he <lb n="c57-0104__main__14"/>now came to
view
my
progress
& claim <lb n="c57-0104__main__15"/><lb n="c57-0104__left_margin__1"/>the
fulfill<lb n="c57-0104__left_margin__2"/>ment
of
<lb n="c57-0104__left_margin__3"/><metamark function="separate">_________</metamark>my promise; as
I looked on
him
his
<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e16988__Start"/>face<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e16988__End"/>countenance<lb n="c57-0104__main__16"/><lb n="c57-0104__left_margin__1"/>appeared to
express<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e17004__Start"/>ed<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e17004__End"/> the utmost extent of malice
<lb n="c57-0104__main__17"/>&<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e17011__Start"/>barbarity<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e17011__End"/>treachery.
I thought with a sensation <lb n="c57-0104__main__18"/>of
<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e17020__Start"/>horror<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e17020__End"/>
madness on my promise of crea<lb n="c57-0104__main__19"/>ting another like to
him
&
trembling <lb n="c57-0104__main__20"/>with
passion <del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e17038__Start"/>as<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e17038__End"/>
tore to pieces the thing <lb n="c57-0104__main__21"/>on which I was
engaged â€“
The wretch <lb n="c57-0104__main__22"/>saw me destroy the creature on whose <lb n="c57-0104__main__23"/>future existence he depended for
<lb n="c57-0104__main__24"/>happiness and
with a howl of devi<lb n="c57-0104__main__25"/>lish despair
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>& revenge
withdrew.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0104__main__26"/>I left the
room &
locking the
door
<lb n="c57-0104__main__27"/>made a
vow in my own heart never <lb n="c57-0104__main__28"/>to resume my labours; &
then
with trem<lb n="c57-0104__main__29"/>bling
steps
I sought my own
appartment
<lb n="c57-0104__main__30"/>I
<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e17087__Start"/>a<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e17087__End"/>
was
alone. <del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e17090__Start"/>n<del loc="c57-0104__main__d1e17090__End"/>
None were near me to <lb n="c57-0104__main__31"/>dissipate the
gloom
and relieve me <lb n="c57-0104__main__32"/>from
the most terrible
reveries. Several
<lb n="c57-0104__main__33"/>hours
passed
and I remained near my <lb n="c57-0104__main__34"/>window gazing on the
sea.
It was almost
<lb n="c57-0104__main__35"/>motionless
for the winds were
hushed &<lb n="c57-0105__main__1"/>all
nature reposed under the eye of the <lb n="c57-0105__main__2"/>quiet
moon
A few
fishing<del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17114__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17114__End"/>
vessels alone <lb n="c57-0105__main__3"/>specked the
water
and now & then the <lb n="c57-0105__main__4"/>gentle
breeze<del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17122__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17122__End"/>
wafted the sound of
the <lb n="c57-0105__main__5"/>voices
as the
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>fishermen
called to one another. <lb n="c57-0105__main__6"/>I felt the
silence
although I was hardly <lb n="c57-0105__main__7"/>conscious of
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>its
extreme
profundity untill
<lb n="c57-0105__main__8"/>my ear was suddenly arrested by <lb n="c57-0105__main__9"/>the paddling of oars near the
shore
<lb n="c57-0105__main__10"/>and a person landed close to my
house. <lb n="c57-0105__main__11"/>In
a few minutes
after
I heard the <lb n="c57-0105__main__12"/>creaking of my
door
as if some one <lb n="c57-0105__main__13"/>endeavoured to open it softly. I <lb n="c57-0105__main__14"/>trembled from head to foot; I felt a <lb n="c57-0105__main__15"/>presentiment of who it
was
and wished <lb n="c57-0105__main__16"/>to rouse one of the peasants who dwelt <lb n="c57-0105__main__17"/>in a cottage not far from
mine.
But <lb n="c57-0105__main__18"/>I was overcome by the
<del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17182__Start"/>fright<del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17182__End"/>
sensation <lb n="c57-0105__main__19"/><lb n="c57-0105__left_margin__1"/>of
helplessness
so often felt in
a
fright<lb n="c57-0105__main__20"/>ful
dream
when you in vain endea<lb n="c57-0105__main__21"/>vour to fly
the
impending
danger &<lb n="c57-0105__main__22"/>was
rooted to the
spot. Presently
I heard <lb n="c57-0105__main__23"/>the sound of footsteps along the
passage,
<lb n="c57-0105__main__24"/><lb n="c57-0105__left_margin__1"/>the door
opened
& the wretch whom I <lb n="c57-0105__main__25"/>dreaded appeared. Shutting the
door
he
<lb n="c57-0105__main__26"/><del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17227__Start"/>advanced towards<del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17227__End"/><lb n="c57-0105__left_margin__1"/>approached me
&
said
in a <lb n="c57-0105__main__27"/>smothered
<del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17240__Start"/>v<del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17240__End"/> voice:â€” You
have
des<lb n="c57-0105__main__28"/>-troyed
the work
that
you began; What <lb n="c57-0105__main__29"/>is it that you intend? Do you dare
break <lb n="c57-0105__main__30"/>your promise? I
<del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17261__Start"/>h<del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17261__End"/>
have endured toil <lb n="c57-0105__main__31"/>& misery: I left Switzerland with you; <lb n="c57-0105__main__32"/>I crept along the shores of the
Rhine <lb n="c57-0105__main__33"/><del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17269__Start"/>with you<del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17269__End"/>,
among its willow
<del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17272__Start"/>ils<del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17272__End"/> islands
<lb n="c57-0105__main__34"/>and
<del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17280__Start"/>upon<del loc="c57-0105__main__d1e17280__End"/>over
the summits of its hills. I
have<lb n="c57-0106__main__1"/>dwelt
many months in the heaths of
England
<lb n="c57-0106__main__2"/>& among the
desarts
of
Scot<del loc="c57-0106__main__d1e17296__Start"/>c<del loc="c57-0106__main__d1e17296__End"/>land.
I have en<lb n="c57-0106__main__3"/>dured incalculable
fatigue
&
cold
&
hunger <del loc="c57-0106__main__d1e17312__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0106__main__d1e17312__End"/><lb n="c57-0106__main__4"/>do
you dare destroy my
hopes?<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0106__main__5"/>Begone, I replied;
I do break my
<del loc="c57-0106__main__d1e17328__Start"/>p<del loc="c57-0106__main__d1e17328__End"/><lb n="c57-0106__main__6"/>promise;
never will
create another like <lb n="c57-0106__main__7"/>yourself, equal in deformity &
wickedness.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0106__main__8"/>Slave, said the wretch,
I before <lb n="c57-0106__main__9"/>reasoned with
you â€“
but you have proved <lb n="c57-0106__main__10"/>yourself unworthy of my condescension. Remem<lb n="c57-0106__main__11"/>ber that I have power; you believe your<lb n="c57-0106__main__12"/>self
miserable
but I can make you so <lb n="c57-0106__main__13"/>wretched that the light of day
<del loc="c57-0106__main__d1e17365__Start"/>of d<del loc="c57-0106__main__d1e17365__End"/>
will <lb n="c57-0106__main__14"/>be hateful to you. You are my
creator
<lb n="c57-0106__main__15"/>but I am your
master; obey!<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0106__main__16"/>Wretch, said I, the
hour of my
weak<lb n="c57-0106__main__17"/>ness
is
past
& the period of your power is <lb n="c57-0106__main__18"/>arrived. Your threats cannot move me <lb n="c57-0106__main__19"/>to do an act of
wickedness
but they confirm <lb n="c57-0106__main__20"/>me in a
resolution
of not creating you
<lb n="c57-0106__main__21"/>companion in vice. Shall
I
in
cold blood
<lb n="c57-0106__main__22"/>set loose upon the earth a
dÃ¦mon
<lb n="c57-0106__main__23"/>whose delight is in death &
wretchedness.
<lb n="c57-0106__main__24"/>Begone,
I am
firm
and your words will <lb n="c57-0106__main__25"/>only exasperate my
rage.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0106__main__26"/>The
Monster saw my determination <lb n="c57-0106__main__27"/>in my
face
and gnashed his teeth in the <lb n="c57-0106__main__28"/>impotence of anger.
Shall
each
man,
cried <lb n="c57-0106__main__29"/>he,
find
his
equal,
& each beast have <lb n="c57-0106__main__30"/>his
mate <del loc="c57-0106__main__d1e17414__Start"/>I<del loc="c57-0106__main__d1e17414__End"/>
and I be
alone.
I had feelings <lb n="c57-0106__main__31"/>of
affection
& they were
returned
by
detes<lb n="c57-0106__main__32"/>tation. Man
you may
hate,
but
beware!<lb n="c57-0107__main__1"/>Your
hours will pass in dread &
misery
<lb n="c57-0107__main__2"/>and soon the bolt will fall which
will
<lb n="c57-0107__main__3"/>ravish from you your happiness for ever. <lb n="c57-0107__main__4"/>Are you to
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>be happy
while I grovel in the <lb n="c57-0107__main__5"/>intensity of my
wretchedness.
You
<del loc="c57-0107__main__d1e17454__Start"/>destroy<del loc="c57-0107__main__d1e17454__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>can
blast my <lb n="c57-0107__main__6"/>other
passions
but revenge
remains; revenge
<lb n="c57-0107__main__7"/>dearer than light or
food.
I may
die
but <lb n="c57-0107__main__8"/>first
you
my tyrant &
tormentor
shall <lb n="c57-0107__main__9"/>curse the sun that gazes on your misery.
<lb n="c57-0107__main__10"/>Beware,
for I am
fearless
& therefore <lb n="c57-0107__main__11"/>powerful. I will watch with the wiliness <lb n="c57-0107__main__12"/>of a
<del loc="c57-0107__main__d1e17480__Start"/>snank<del loc="c57-0107__main__d1e17480__End"/> snake
that I may sting with <lb n="c57-0107__main__13"/>its venom. Man, you shall repent <lb n="c57-0107__main__14"/>of the injuries you
inflict.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0107__main__15"/>Devil, I cried, Cease,
& do not <lb n="c57-0107__main__16"/>poison the air with
those
sounds <lb n="c57-0107__main__17"/>of malice. I have declared my resolution <lb n="c57-0107__main__18"/>to
you
and I am no coward to bend <lb n="c57-0107__main__19"/>beneath
words â€“
Leave
me,
I am
inexo<lb n="c57-0107__main__20"/>rable.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0107__main__21"/>It
is
well, said he,
I go; but
remem<lb n="c57-0107__main__22"/>ber!
I shall be with you on your
<lb n="c57-0107__main__23"/>marriage night.<lb n="c57-0108__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0108.02" unit="tei:head"/>Chapter 13rd<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0108__main__2"/>I
started
forward
&
exclaimedâ€”Villain,
before <lb n="c57-0108__main__3"/>you sign my death-warrant, be sure that <lb n="c57-0108__main__4"/>you are yourself
safe. I
would have seized
<lb n="c57-0108__main__5"/>him
but he eluded
me
and
quitting
the house <lb n="c57-0108__main__6"/>with
precipitation
in a few moments I saw him <lb n="c57-0108__main__7"/>in his
boat
which shot across the waters with <lb n="c57-0108__main__8"/>an arrowy
swiftness
& was soon lost amidst the <lb n="c57-0108__main__9"/>waves.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0108__main__10"/>All was again silent; but his words rung in <lb n="c57-0108__main__11"/>my
ears;
I
burnt
with rage to pursue the <lb n="c57-0108__main__12"/>murderer of my
peace
& precipitate him into <lb n="c57-0108__main__13"/>the ocean. I walked up & down my room hastily <lb n="c57-0108__main__14"/>& perturbed,
my imagination conjured
before <lb n="c57-0108__main__15"/>me
a thousand images
<del loc="c57-0108__main__d1e17567__Start"/>all<del loc="c57-0108__main__d1e17567__End"/>
to torment & sting
<lb n="c57-0108__main__16"/>me â€“
Why
<del loc="c57-0108__main__d1e17572__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0108__main__d1e17572__End"/>
had I not followed
him
& closed with <lb n="c57-0108__main__17"/>him
in<del loc="c57-0108__main__d1e17577__Start"/>t<del loc="c57-0108__main__d1e17577__End"/>
mortal
strifeâ€“?
But I had suffered <lb n="c57-0108__main__18"/>him to
depart
and he had directed his course <lb n="c57-0108__main__19"/>towards the main
land;
I shuddered to
sup<lb n="c57-0108__main__20"/>pose
who might be the next victim sacri<lb n="c57-0108__main__21"/>ficed to his insatiate
revenge â€“
And then
<lb n="c57-0108__main__22"/>again
I thought
of his
words â€“ "I
will be
with<lb n="c57-0108__main__23"/>you
on your
marriage night
That then <lb n="c57-0108__main__24"/>was the period fixed for the
fulfillment
<lb n="c57-0108__main__25"/>of my
destiny â€“
In that
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>hour
I should
die
and at <lb n="c57-0108__main__26"/>once satisfy and extinguish his malice.
Yet <lb n="c57-0108__main__27"/>when I thought of Elizabeth
The prospect did
<lb n="c57-0108__main__28"/>not
not move me to
fear
yet when I thought <lb n="c57-0108__main__29"/>of my beloved
Elizabeth; of
her tears & endless
<lb n="c57-0108__main__30"/>sorrow
when she should find her lover <lb n="c57-0108__main__31"/>so barbarously snatched from
her â€“tears
<lb n="c57-0108__main__32"/>the first I had shed for many months, stream<lb n="c57-0108__main__33"/>ed from my
eyes
& I resolved not to fall before <lb n="c57-0108__main__34"/>my enemy without a bitter struggle.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0108__main__35"/>The night passed
away
& the sun rose <lb n="c57-0108__main__36"/>from the
ocean â€“
My feelings became
calmer
<lb n="c57-0108__main__37"/>if it may be called
calmness
when the <lb n="c57-0108__main__38"/>violence of rage sinks into the depths
of<lb n="c57-0109__main__1"/>despair.
I left the house, the horrid scene <lb n="c57-0109__main__2"/>of the last
nights contention
and walked on <lb n="c57-0109__main__3"/>the beach of the
sea
which I almost regarded <lb n="c57-0109__main__4"/>as an insuperable barrier between me & my
<lb n="c57-0109__main__5"/>fellow creatures. Nay
a wish that
<del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17705__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17705__End"/>such was
<lb n="c57-0109__main__6"/>the fact stole across
me;
I
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>wished
that I might pass my <lb n="c57-0109__main__7"/>life on
this
barren
rock
wearily
it is
true
<lb n="c57-0109__main__8"/>but uninterrupted by any sudden shock <lb n="c57-0109__main__9"/>of
misery â€“If
I
returned <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>it
was to be
<del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17741__Start"/>myself a<del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17741__End"/>sa<lb n="c57-0109__main__10"/>crificed
or to see those
I most loved die <lb n="c57-0109__main__11"/>under the grasp of a dÃ¦mon whom I <lb n="c57-0109__main__12"/>had myself
created. I
walked about the <lb n="c57-0109__main__13"/>isle like a restless
spectre seperated
from <lb n="c57-0109__main__14"/>all it
loved
& miserable in the
seperation
<lb n="c57-0109__main__15"/>When it became
noon
& the sun rose
<lb n="c57-0109__main__16"/>higher
I lay down
<del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17764__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17764__End"/>
on the
grass
& was <lb n="c57-0109__main__17"/>overpowered by a deep sleep. I had been <lb n="c57-0109__main__18"/>awake the whole of the
preceeding
night, <lb n="c57-0109__main__19"/>my nerves were
agitated
& my eyes inflamed
<lb n="c57-0109__main__20"/>with
watching & misery. The sleep into which <lb n="c57-0109__main__21"/>I now sunk refreshed
me
& when I
awoke
<lb n="c57-0109__main__22"/>I again felt as if I belonged to a race of <lb n="c57-0109__main__23"/>human beings like
myself
& I began to <lb n="c57-0109__main__24"/>reflect upon what had passed with <lb n="c57-0109__main__25"/>greater
composure â€”Yet
still the words of <lb n="c57-0109__main__26"/>the fiend rung in my
<del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17788__Start"/>y<del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17788__End"/>ears
like a
death <lb n="c57-0109__main__27"/>knell,
they appeared like a dream, yet <lb n="c57-0109__main__28"/>distinct and oppressive as a reality.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0109__main__29"/>The
<del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17803__Start"/>T<del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17803__End"/>
sun
was
far
descended
and I still <lb n="c57-0109__main__30"/>sat on the
shore
satisfying my
ap<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>petite
<lb n="c57-0109__main__31"/>which
was
become
ravenous
with an <lb n="c57-0109__main__32"/>oaten
cake
when I saw a
fishing <del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17823__Start"/>boat<del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17823__End"/><del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17826__Start"/>sk<del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17826__End"/> boat
<lb n="c57-0109__main__33"/>land close to
me
& one of the men brought <lb n="c57-0109__main__34"/>me a packet; it contained letters from
<lb n="c57-0109__main__35"/>Geneva
& one from
Cl<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>erval
entreating me <lb n="c57-0109__main__36"/>to
<del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17848__Start"/>g<del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17848__End"/>
join him. He said
<del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17852__Start"/>a<del loc="c57-0109__main__d1e17852__End"/>
that
nearly
a<lb n="c57-0110__main__1"/>year
had
<del loc="c57-0110__main__d1e17864__Start"/>passed<del loc="c57-0110__main__d1e17864__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>elapsed
since we
had
quitted
Switzerland
<lb n="c57-0110__main__2"/>and France was yet unvisited.
He entreated
me
<lb n="c57-0110__main__3"/>therefore
to
<del loc="c57-0110__main__d1e17879__Start"/>return<del loc="c57-0110__main__d1e17879__End"/>
leave my solitary
isle
<lb n="c57-0110__main__4"/>and
meet him at
Perth
in a week from
that
<lb n="c57-0110__main__5"/>time
when
we might
arrange
<del loc="c57-0110__main__d1e17887__Start"/>our<del loc="c57-0110__main__d1e17887__End"/>
the plan <lb n="c57-0110__main__6"/>of our future proceedings.
This letter
complete<lb n="c57-0110__main__7"/>ly
recalled
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>me
to
life
& I determined to quit my <lb n="c57-0110__main__8"/>island
<del loc="c57-0110__main__d1e17911__Start"/>the next day<del loc="c57-0110__main__d1e17911__End"/>.
at the expiration of two
days<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0110__main__9"/>Yet
before I
departed
there was a task <lb n="c57-0110__main__10"/>to
perform
on which I shuddered to
<del loc="c57-0110__main__d1e17921__Start"/>think<del loc="c57-0110__main__d1e17921__End"/><lb n="c57-0110__main__11"/><lb n="c57-0110__left_margin__1"/>reflect:
I must pack
my chemical
instruments
<lb n="c57-0110__main__12"/>& for that purpose I must enter the room <lb n="c57-0110__main__13"/>which had been the scene of my odious
<lb n="c57-0110__main__14"/>work,&
I must handle
the utensils
the sight <lb n="c57-0110__main__15"/>of which
were
sickening to me. The <lb n="c57-0110__main__16"/>next
morning
at
daybreak
I summoned <lb n="c57-0110__main__17"/>sufficient
courage
& unlocked the door <lb n="c57-0110__main__18"/>of my
work room â€“
The remains of the
half fi<lb n="c57-0110__main__19"/>nished creature
whom I had
destroyed
lay <lb n="c57-0110__main__20"/>scattered on the
floor â€“
& I almost felt as <lb n="c57-0110__main__21"/>if I had mangled the living flesh of a human <lb n="c57-0110__main__22"/>being. I paused to collect
myself
& then <lb n="c57-0110__main__23"/>entered the chamber. With trembling
hands
<lb n="c57-0110__main__24"/>I conveyed the instruments out of the
room
<lb n="c57-0110__main__25"/>but I reflected that I ought not to leave <lb n="c57-0110__main__26"/>the
relicks
of my work to excite the horror <lb n="c57-0110__main__27"/>& suspicion of the
peasants
and I accordingly put them <lb n="c57-0110__main__28"/>into a
basket
with a great quantity of
<lb n="c57-0110__main__29"/>stones
and
tying it up
determined to throw <lb n="c57-0110__main__30"/>them into the sea that very
night
and <lb n="c57-0110__main__31"/>in the mean time I sat
on
the
beach
em<lb n="c57-0110__main__32"/>ployed in cleaning & arranging my chemical <lb n="c57-0110__main__33"/>apparatus.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0110__main__34"/>Nothing
<del loc="c57-0110__main__d1e18006__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0110__main__d1e18006__End"/>
could be more complete than <lb n="c57-0110__main__35"/>the alteration that had taken place
in<lb n="c57-0111__main__1"/>my
feelings since the night of the ap<lb n="c57-0111__main__2"/>pearance of the dÃ¦mon. I had before <lb n="c57-0111__main__3"/>regarded my promise with
gloomy
despair
<lb n="c57-0111__main__4"/>as
a<del loc="c57-0111__main__d1e18029__Start"/>n<del loc="c57-0111__main__d1e18029__End"/>
thing
that must <del loc="c57-0111__main__d1e18032__Start"/>at<del loc="c57-0111__main__d1e18032__End"/>
with whatever
<lb n="c57-0111__main__5"/>consequences
be
fulfilled
but I now felt <lb n="c57-0111__main__6"/>as if a film had been taken from before <lb n="c57-0111__main__7"/>my
eyes
& that
I now
for the first
time
<lb n="c57-0111__main__8"/>saw clearly.
<del loc="c57-0111__main__d1e18044__Start"/>It never once<del loc="c57-0111__main__d1e18044__End"/>
The idea of <lb n="c57-0111__main__9"/>renewing my labours did not for
an
<lb n="c57-0111__main__10"/>instant occur to
me.
The threat I had <lb n="c57-0111__main__11"/>heard weighed on my
thoughts
but I
<del loc="c57-0111__main__d1e18053__Start"/>never<del loc="c57-0111__main__d1e18053__End"/>did<lb n="c57-0111__main__12"/><lb n="c57-0111__left_margin__1"/>not
reflect
<del loc="c57-0111__main__d1e18067__Start"/>suppose<del loc="c57-0111__main__d1e18067__End"/><del loc="c57-0111__main__d1e18069__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0111__main__d1e18069__End"/>
that a voluntary act of mine
<lb n="c57-0111__main__13"/>might
avert it. I had resolved in my <lb n="c57-0111__main__14"/>own
mind
that to create another like <lb n="c57-0111__main__15"/>the fiend I had first made would be <lb n="c57-0111__main__16"/>an act of the basest & most atrocious
<lb n="c57-0111__main__17"/>selfishness
and I
<del loc="c57-0111__main__d1e18084__Start"/>did not<del loc="c57-0111__main__d1e18084__End"/>
banished <lb n="c57-0111__main__18"/>from my mind every thought that <lb n="c57-0111__main__19"/>could lead to a different
conclusion<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0111__main__20"/>Between
two & three in the morning <lb n="c57-0111__main__21"/>the moon
rose
and I
then
putting my <lb n="c57-0111__main__22"/>basket
into
a little
skiff
sailed out about <lb n="c57-0111__main__23"/>four miles from the
shore â€“
The scene <lb n="c57-0111__main__24"/>was perfectly
solitary,
a few boats were <lb n="c57-0111__main__25"/>returning towards
land
but I sailed <lb n="c57-0111__main__26"/>away from them. I felt as if I was <lb n="c57-0111__main__27"/>about the commission of a dreadful
<lb n="c57-0111__main__28"/>crime
and avoided with shuddering <lb n="c57-0111__main__29"/>anxiety any encounter with my
fellow <lb n="c57-0111__main__30"/>creatures.
At one time the
moon
which <lb n="c57-0111__main__31"/>had before been
clear
was suddenly
<del loc="c57-0111__main__d1e18123__Start"/>covered<del loc="c57-0111__main__d1e18123__End"/><lb n="c57-0111__main__32"/>overspread
by a thick
cloud &<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>I
took advan<lb n="c57-0111__main__33"/>tage of the moment of
darkness
&
cast<lb n="c57-0112__main__1"/>the
basket into the
sea â€“
I listened to the gurg<lb n="c57-0112__main__2"/>ling sound as it
sunk
& then
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>sailed
away from the <lb n="c57-0112__main__3"/>spot. The sky
had become clouded
but the <lb n="c57-0112__main__4"/>air was
pure
although
<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18173__Start"/>a<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18173__End"/>
chilled by the <lb n="c57-0112__main__5"/>North-East breeze that was
rising. But <lb n="c57-0112__main__6"/>it refreshed
& filled me with such
agreable <lb n="c57-0112__main__7"/>sensations
that I resolved to prolong <lb n="c57-0112__main__8"/>my stay on the
water &<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18187__Start"/>leaving<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18187__End"/>fixing
the rudder
<lb n="c57-0112__main__9"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><lb n="c57-0112__left_margin__1"/>in
a direct
position
stretched myself at the bottom of the boat. <lb n="c57-0112__main__10"/>Clouds hid the moon, every thing was
obscure
<lb n="c57-0112__main__11"/>& I heard only the sound of the
boat
as
it
<lb n="c57-0112__main__12"/>keel cut through the
wavesâ€“The sound
<lb n="c57-0112__main__13"/>lulled
meâ€“&
in a short time I slept
<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18220__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18220__End"/><lb n="c57-0112__main__14"/>soundly<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0112__main__15"/>I
do not know how long I remained in <lb n="c57-0112__main__16"/>this
situation
but when I awoke I found <lb n="c57-0112__main__17"/>that the sun had already mounted
considerablyâ€“
<lb n="c57-0112__main__18"/>The wind was
high
and the waves
<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18236__Start"/>th<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18236__End"/>
continually <lb n="c57-0112__main__19"/>threatened the safety of my little
<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18241__Start"/>boat<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18241__End"/> skiffâ€”
<lb n="c57-0112__main__20"/>I
<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18247__Start"/>endeavoure<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18247__End"/>
found that the wind
wasnorth-<lb n="c57-0112__main__21"/>east
and must have driven me far <lb n="c57-0112__main__22"/>from the coast from which I had embarked. <lb n="c57-0112__main__23"/>I endeavoured to
<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18263__Start"/>turn<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18263__End"/><del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18266__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18266__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18273__Start"/>boat<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18273__End"/>change
my
course
but <lb n="c57-0112__main__24"/>quickly found
that
if I again
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>made
the
attempt<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18292__Start"/>ed<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18292__End"/><del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18295__Start"/>it<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18295__End"/><lb n="c57-0112__main__25"/>the
boat would be instantly filled with <lb n="c57-0112__main__26"/>water. Thus
situated
my only resource was <lb n="c57-0112__main__27"/>to drive before the
wind â€“ <del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18311__Start"/>To be a<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18311__End"/>
I confess <lb n="c57-0112__main__28"/>that I felt a few sensations of
terror â€“I
had <lb n="c57-0112__main__29"/>no compass with
me
and was so
little
<lb n="c57-0112__main__30"/>acquainted with the geography of this part <lb n="c57-0112__main__31"/>of the
world
that the sun was of little be<lb n="c57-0112__main__32"/>nefit to
me â€“I
might be
<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18330__Start"/>driv<del loc="c57-0112__main__d1e18330__End"/>
driven into <lb n="c57-0112__main__33"/>the wide
Atlantic
& feel all the tortures <lb n="c57-0112__main__34"/>of
starvation
or be swallowed up in
<lb n="c57-0112__main__35"/>immeasurable waters that roared
&<lb n="c57-0113__main__1"/>buffeted
around me. I had already been out <lb n="c57-0113__main__2"/>many
hours
and felt the
tortures
of a <lb n="c57-0113__main__3"/>burning
thirst
a prelude to my other
<lb n="c57-0113__main__4"/>sufferings â€“
I looked on the
heavens
which
<lb n="c57-0113__main__5"/>was
covered by clouds that
<del loc="c57-0113__main__d1e18355__Start"/>pass<del loc="c57-0113__main__d1e18355__End"/>
flew
<lb n="c57-0113__main__6"/>with
the
wind
only to be replaced by
othersâ€“
<lb n="c57-0113__main__7"/>I looked
on
the
sea â€“
It was to be my grave.
<lb n="c57-0113__main__8"/>Fiend,
I exclaimed,
your
task is already
<lb n="c57-0113__main__9"/>fulfilledâ€”I
thought of
Elizabeth
of my
<lb n="c57-0113__main__10"/>father
& of
Clerval â€“
&
sunk
into a
reverie
<lb n="c57-0113__main__11"/>so despairing &
frightful
that even
now
<lb n="c57-0113__main__12"/>when the scene is on the point of closing <lb n="c57-0113__main__13"/>before me for
ever
I shudder to reflect <lb n="c57-0113__main__14"/>on it.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0113__main__15"/>Some hours passed
thusâ€“But
by <lb n="c57-0113__main__16"/>degrees, as the sun
<del loc="c57-0113__main__d1e18392__Start"/>verged<del loc="c57-0113__main__d1e18392__End"/>declined
towards the <lb n="c57-0113__main__17"/>horizon, the
<del loc="c57-0113__main__d1e18403__Start"/>breezed<del loc="c57-0113__main__d1e18403__End"/>wind
died away into <lb n="c57-0113__main__18"/>a gentle
breeze
and the
<del loc="c57-0113__main__d1e18413__Start"/>breakers ce<del loc="c57-0113__main__d1e18413__End"/>
sea
<lb n="c57-0113__main__19"/><del loc="c57-0113__main__d1e18419__Start"/>was smothed<del loc="c57-0113__main__d1e18419__End"/>
became free from breakers. <lb n="c57-0113__main__20"/>But these gave place to a heavy
swell,
<lb n="c57-0113__main__21"/>I felt
sick
& hardly able to hold the
rud<lb n="c57-0113__main__22"/>der
when suddenly I saw a line of <lb n="c57-0113__main__23"/>high land towards the
south.
Almost
<lb n="c57-0113__main__24"/>spent
as I
was
by
fatigue
&
misery
this <lb n="c57-0113__main__25"/>sudden certainty of life rushed like a
<lb n="c57-0113__main__26"/>warm joy to my
heart
and tears
gush <lb n="c57-0113__main__27"/>ed
from my
eyes. How
mutable are our
<lb n="c57-0113__main__28"/>feelings
& how strange is that clinging love <lb n="c57-0113__main__29"/>we have of life even in the excess of
<lb n="c57-0113__main__30"/>misery. I steered my boat towards the shore <lb n="c57-0113__main__31"/>and<lb n="c57-0113__left_margin__1"/>
I constructed another sail with a <lb n="c57-0113__main__32"/>part of my
dress
& eagerly
st<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>eered
my course <lb n="c57-0113__main__33"/>towards the land. It had a wild
rocky<lb n="c57-0114__main__1"/>appearance but
as I approached
nearer
I <lb n="c57-0114__main__2"/>easily perceived the traces of
cultivation â€“I
saw <lb n="c57-0114__main__3"/>vessels near the
shore
& found myself sud<lb n="c57-0114__main__4"/>denly transported back to the
neighborhood
<lb n="c57-0114__main__5"/>of
civilized
man â€“
I
eagerly
<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18510__Start"/>viewed<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18510__End"/>traced
the windings <lb n="c57-0114__main__6"/>of the
<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18521__Start"/>hor<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18521__End"/>land&
hailed a steeple which
after <lb n="c57-0114__main__7"/>sailing
I at length saw
issueing
from
<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18535__Start"/>ani<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18535__End"/>
behind <lb n="c57-0114__main__8"/>a small
promontory â€“
As I was
<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18548__Start"/>fainting<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18548__End"/>
in <lb n="c57-0114__main__9"/>a
st<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18554__Start"/>r<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18554__End"/>ate
of extreme
debility from fasting
<lb n="c57-0114__main__10"/>I resolved to
go
directly towards the
town
<lb n="c57-0114__main__11"/>as a place where
could most easily
pro<lb n="c57-0114__main__12"/>cure<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18568__Start"/>f<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18568__End"/> nourishmentâ€“
Fortunately I had <lb n="c57-0114__main__13"/>money with
me.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0114__main__14"/>As
I turned the
promontory
I
discovered
<lb n="c57-0114__main__15"/>a small neat town
â€“ <del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18586__Start"/>a<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18586__End"/>
and a good
harbour
<lb n="c57-0114__main__16"/>which I entered, my heart bounding with <lb n="c57-0114__main__17"/>joy at my unexpected
escape. <milestone unit="tei:p"/><metamark function="paragraph">[</metamark>As
I
<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18598__Start"/>fi<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18598__End"/>
was <lb n="c57-0114__main__18"/>occupied in fixing the boat and
ar
arranging <lb n="c57-0114__main__19"/>the
sails
several people crowded towards <lb n="c57-0114__main__20"/>the
spot â€“
They
appeared
very
much
much <lb n="c57-0114__main__21"/>surprised at my
appearance <del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18613__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18613__End"/> but
<lb n="c57-0114__main__22"/>instead of offering me any
assistance
<lb n="c57-0114__main__23"/>whispered together
<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18620__Start"/>in<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18620__End"/>
with gestures that <lb n="c57-0114__main__24"/>at any other time might have produced <lb n="c57-0114__main__25"/>in me a slight sensation of
alarm â€“as
it
<lb n="c57-0114__main__26"/>was
I merely remarked
<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18630__Start"/>th<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18630__End"/> that it was <lb n="c57-0114__main__27"/>English,
that they spoke
and
therefore <lb n="c57-0114__main__28"/>addressed
them; My
Good
Friends,
said I,
Will
you
<lb n="c57-0114__main__29"/>be<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18639__Start"/>so<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18639__End"/>
so kind as to tell me
what
the name <lb n="c57-0114__main__30"/>of this
<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18647__Start"/>place<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18647__End"/>town is;
&
where I
am.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0114__main__31"/>You
will know that soon
enough,
re<lb n="c57-0114__main__32"/>plied
a<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18665__Start"/>n<del loc="c57-0114__main__d1e18665__End"/>
man with a
gruff
voice; May
be <lb n="c57-0114__main__33"/>you are come to a place that will <lb n="c57-0114__main__34"/>not prove much to your
taste â€“ But<lb n="c57-0115__main__1"/>you
will not be consulted as to your <lb n="c57-0115__main__2"/>quarters, I promise
youâ€”<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0115__main__3"/><del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18685__Start"/>My<del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18685__End"/> I
was exceedingly
surprized at
receiv<lb n="c57-0115__main__4"/>ing so rude an answer from a
stranger
<lb n="c57-0115__main__5"/>and I was also disconcerted on perceiving
the<lb n="c57-0115__main__6"/>the countenance of this man an his <lb n="c57-0115__main__7"/>companions frow<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ning
and angry countenances <lb n="c57-0115__main__8"/>of his
companions â€“ <del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18720__Start"/>Why<del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18720__End"/> Why
do you answer <lb n="c57-0115__main__9"/>me so
roughly,
I
replied Surely <del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18726__Start"/>as En<del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18726__End"/>
it <lb n="c57-0115__main__10"/>is not the custom of Englishmen to receive <lb n="c57-0115__main__11"/>strangers
<del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18733__Start"/>in<del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18733__End"/>
so
inhospitably.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0115__main__12"/>I
do not
know,
said the man,
what
<lb n="c57-0115__main__13"/>the custom of the English may
be
but <lb n="c57-0115__main__14"/>it is the custom of the Irish to hate
<lb n="c57-0115__main__15"/>villains. <milestone unit="tei:p"/><metamark function="paragraph">[</metamark>While
this strange dialogue
<lb n="c57-0115__main__16"/>continued
I perceived the
croud <del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18756__Start"/>en<del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18756__End"/>
rapidly
<lb n="c57-0115__main__17"/>encrease.
Their
<del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18763__Start"/>countenances<del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18763__End"/>faces
expressed <lb n="c57-0115__main__18"/>a mixture of
<del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18772__Start"/>ang<del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18772__End"/>
curiosity &
anger <lb n="c57-0115__main__19"/><del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18777__Start"/>wit<del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18777__End"/>
which
annoyed
& in some degree <lb n="c57-0115__main__20"/>alarmed me. I
enquired
the way to the
inn
<lb n="c57-0115__main__21"/>but no one
replied â€“
I then moved
foward
<lb n="c57-0115__main__22"/>and
<del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18799__Start"/>a buz arose<del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18799__End"/>
a murmuring
noise <lb n="c57-0115__main__23"/>rose
from the
croud <del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18804__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18804__End"/>
as they followed <lb n="c57-0115__main__24"/>& surrounded
meâ€”
when an
ill looking
<lb n="c57-0115__main__25"/>man
comming forwardâ€“
tapped me on <lb n="c57-0115__main__26"/>the
shoulder
&
said â€“ Come, <del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18814__Start"/>yo<del loc="c57-0115__main__d1e18814__End"/>
Sir, You <lb n="c57-0115__main__27"/>must follow me to Mr.
Kirwins
to give <lb n="c57-0115__main__28"/>an account of
yourself.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0115__main__29"/>Who
is Mr.
Kirwin, said I, &
why am <lb n="c57-0115__main__30"/>I to give an account of
myself.â€“is
not <lb n="c57-0115__main__31"/>this a free
country?<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0115__main__32"/>Aye,
Sir,
replied the man,
free enough <lb n="c57-0115__main__33"/>for honest folks. Mr. Kirwin is a
magis<lb n="c57-0115__main__34"/>trate&
you are to give an account
of<lb n="c57-0116__main__1"/>the
death of a gentleman who was found murdered <lb n="c57-0116__main__2"/>here last
night.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0116__main__3"/>This
answer startled
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>me,
But I presently <lb n="c57-0116__main__4"/>recovered myself. I was
innocent &
that could <lb n="c57-0116__main__5"/>easily be
proved â€“
accordingly I followed my con<lb n="c57-0116__main__6"/>ductor in
silence
& was led to
<del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18883__Start"/>wha<del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18883__End"/>
one of the <lb n="c57-0116__main__7"/>best houses in the town. I was ready to sink from <lb n="c57-0116__main__8"/>fatigue &
hunger, but
being surrounded by <lb n="c57-0116__main__9"/>a
croud
I thought it politic to rouse all <lb n="c57-0116__main__10"/>my
strength
that no physical debility might <lb n="c57-0116__main__11"/>be construed into apprehension
<del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18916__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18916__End"/>
or cons<lb n="c57-0116__main__12"/>cious guilt. Little did I then expect the <lb n="c57-0116__main__13"/>calamity that
would
in a few moments
<lb n="c57-0116__main__14"/>overwhelm me, and
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>extinguish
in horror & despair
<lb n="c57-0116__main__15"/><del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18941__Start"/>extinguish<del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18941__End"/>
all fear of ignominy or
deathâ€” <lb n="c57-0116__main__16"/><del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18946__Start"/>The sun & ea<del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18946__End"/> I
must pause
<del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18949__Start"/>for
the<del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18949__End"/><lb n="c57-0116__main__17"/><del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18953__Start"/>sc<del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18953__End"/><del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18955__Start"/>ene which I shall now relate<del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18955__End"/>for
it requires <lb n="c57-0116__main__18"/><del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18964__Start"/>all my
fortitude<del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18964__End"/>& strength to suffer <lb n="c57-0116__main__19"/>me
to recall
<del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18975__Start"/>its<del loc="c57-0116__main__d1e18975__End"/>the frightful images <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>of
the
events which<lb n="c57-0116__left_margin__1"/> I am about <lb n="c57-0116__left_margin__2"/>to
relate in
in <lb n="c57-0116__main__20"/>proper
detail
to my recollection.
